text:
When installing with DESTDIR set, the stuff in the srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib
directory is installed as if DESTDIR is not set.

The easiest way to solve this is to comment out the DESTDIR setting in
srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/lib/Makefile.in
creator: frodol@dds.nl
jorton@redhat.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14076 ***
